results.title: Bone marrow-derived mesenchymal stem cell and simvastatin treatment leads to improved functional recovery and modified c-Fos expression levels in the brain following ischemic stroke
results.text_hl: However, the precise mechanisms mediating the improved neurological functional recovery in @<m>DISEASE_Adams_Stokes_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000219 @@@stoke@@@ models following a combination treatment of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and BMSCs still remained poorly understood.
